title.narrative: Ethiopia Investment Advisory Facility Funding for Main Supplier

description.narrative: This activity (Ethiopia Investment Advisory Facility Funding for Main Supplier) is a component of Ethiopia Investment Advisory Facility reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £32,603,708. This component benefits Ethiopia, and works in the following sector(s): Transport policy and administrative management, Immediate post-emergency reconstruction and rehabilitation. , with the following implementing partners: McKinsey & Company. The start date is 14-03-2014 and the end date is 30-06-2021.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - Social Affairs - Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - disaster prevention and preparedness
Transport - Economic Affairs - Transport - policy, planning and administration
